member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem
member.summary: Represents a file to resize/re-encode, the resize/encoding settings

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem.Copy
member.summary: Copies the class, useful for preventing threading issues. Lightweight, only 4 pointers plus class instance.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem.SetImmutable
member.summary: Blocks any future changes to the instance, throwing an InvalidOperationException.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem.PhysicalPath
member.summary: Filesystem path, such as C:\Web\Project\Image\file.jpg. Throws an InvalidOperationException if you attempt to modify an immutable instance.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem.TargetFilename
member.summary: The target filename to use in the compressed folder. If left null, the filename of physicalPath will be used. Should not include the file extension, that will be assigned based on resizeQuerystring and the original extension. Throws an InvalidOperationException if you attempt to modify an immutable instance.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings
member.summary: Use this to configure the a resize job. After you start the job, do not modify this instance.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings.FixDuplicateFilenames(System.String)
member.summary: Loops through all files, assigning targetFilenames if they are null, and eliminating duplicate names by adding _1, _2, etc. Also normalizes filenames for use in zip folder. Used internally. May be used externally also if calling code wishes to to know the final file names.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings.NormalizePathForUseInZipFile(System.String)
member.summary: Utility routine for transforming path names from filesystem format (on Windows that means backslashes) to a format suitable for use within zipfiles. This means trimming the volume letter and colon (if any) And swapping backslashes for forward slashes.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings.AppendFinalExtensions
member.summary: Adds the correct, final extension to each target file name.Internal use only.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings.ItemEvent
member.summary: Fired when a file is successfully written to the zip file, or if an item fails to be added to the zip file. Will execute on a thread pool thread. Catch all your exeptions, or they will cause the jobe to fail. Set e.Cancel to cancel the job. Uses the same thread the job is processing on - I/O bound tasks in handlers should be async if possible.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings.JobEvent
member.summary: Fires when the Zip file has successfully been written to disk, when the job fails. Will execute on a thread pool thread. Catch all your exeptions, or they will cause the asp.net proccess to restart!

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.ItemEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Set to true to cancel the job. Defaults to false for all events.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.ItemEventArgs.Stats
member.summary: A snapshot of job statistics

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobCancelledException
member.summary: Not always the execption you'll see in the JobEvent handler when you cancel a job.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.ItemResult
member.summary: Holds the result of a items resize and/or compression attempt.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.ItemResult.Successful
member.summary: True if the item was successfully copied into the zip file.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.ItemResult.ItemError
member.summary: The exception that occured when resizing, opening, copying, or compressing the file.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobResult.Successful
member.summary: True if the job was completed successfully. Doesn't mean there were not errors on individual files, check ItemResults or Stats for that information. Just means there should be a .zip waiting.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobResult.ItemResults
member.summary: The individual results for each of the items requested.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobResult.JobError
member.summary: The exception that occured while processing the job.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobResult.Stats
member.summary: A snapshot of job statistics

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobStats.RequestedItems
member.summary: The number of items specified in the job description

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobStats.SuccessfulItems
member.summary: The number of items successfully added to the zip file

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobStats.FailedItems
member.summary: The number of items that failed to be added.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.JobStats.ExecutionTime
member.summary: The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since the job began.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker
member.summary: Synchronous worker class, not thread safe. Should be executed and touched by a single thread.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.#ctor(ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new worker instance. Do not modify the settings while executing the Work() method.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.s
member.summary: Stores the job settings.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.items
member.summary: Used to map ZIP item names to instances. Required do to DotNetZipLib's callback system.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.results
member.summary: Used to store the results of each resized item.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.startedAt
member.summary: When the job was started

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.finishedAt
member.summary: When the job was finished

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.Work
member.summary: Executes the job, and returns when it is complete or has failed. Exceptions are delivered by events registered in the BatchResizeSetting instance - throws no execptions, unless you throw an execption inside a job event handler.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.Work(System.Object)
member.summary: Not for external use. Assumes 'state' is a BatchResizeSettings instance, and stores in in a class member. Next, it completes (or fails at) the job. Throws exceptions only if (a) state is not a BatchResizeSettings instance, or (b) an exception is thrown by and handler of the JobEvent (Failed) event.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.wouldResize(ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified item is going to be resized.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.WriteItemCallback(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Called from ZipFile.Save as each queued entry is processed.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.CopyStreamTo(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Copies a read stream to a write stream.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.savingCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Stores the results of the Zip file saving betweent he time Saving_Completed fires, and we close the ZipFile instance and fire our own event

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.successfulItems
member.summary: How many items have been successfully resized and zipped

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.failedItems
member.summary: How many items failed to be resized and zipped

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.GetJobStats
member.summary: Returns a snapshots of the job statistics

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.ItemFailed(Ionic.Zip.ZipErrorEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when an error occurs during Save() (Whitch executes WriteItemCallback)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.ItemFailed(ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem,System.Exception)
member.summary: Called when ZipFile.AddEntry fails. (Most errors should NOT happen here).

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.CreateDestinationFolder
member.summary: If the parent folder of the destination archive is missing, this method will create it.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeWorker.BuildDict(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeItem})
member.summary: Builds a dictionary from a collection of BatchResizeItems, using .targetFilename as the key.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeManager
member.summary: Handles the threading of a batch resize procedure. Use the static method to queue a resize on a thread pool thread

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeManager.BeginBatchResize(ImageResizer.Plugins.BatchZipper.BatchResizeSettings)
member.summary: Begins a batch resize operation on a background thread. If the ASP.NET process recycles, or the server reboots, the process will be aborted.
